# Bringing new iOS unique features #
1. Siri; you can now wake up deep sleep with Siri. Use your voice to wake up a period of white noise, light music, and start a breathing exercise.
2. Widget; brings the falling snow animation to the widget for the first time. Go and see this extraordinary effect.
3. 3D Touch; press (long press) the deep sleep icon on the phone screen to wake up the quick function bar.
4. Share page modification, with a small surprise.
5. Other optimizations

1. 全新时光日记功能上线
1.1 支持图文混排
1.2 支持文字对齐方式
1.3 支持加粗、斜体、划线
1.4 支持文字颜色选择、字体大小
1.5 生成长图，并分享

2. 修复无法分享到第三方的问题

3. 其他细节优化
